title: No-op: Contact form already implemented on Contact section
constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.

Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if existing stable state requires it.
nonGoals: Do not add a new contact form UI; one already exists.
Do not add third-party email/SMS integrations (e.g., SendGrid/Mailgun/Twilio).
Do not add real-time messaging or chat features.
